name: OXTO Energy
slogan: Novel Grid Scale energy storage technology
description:
OXTO Energy has developed OXTO ON, a patented flywheel based form of energy storage

Electric energy is stored in the form of kinetic energy on a high-speed spinning energy wheel and is converted back to electric using a novel and efficient switching mechanism. OXTO is able to offer a very high round-trip efficiency while outweighing the best features of existing mechanical and chemical battery devices presently in use

OXTO plans to become a full global energy management services company with ability to shift storage loads dynamically between multiple flywheel installations to rapidly meet changing customer demand and optimise system efficiency

team.name: George Prassinos
team.bioHtml:
Founder of OXTO Energy.

PhD in Satellite Engineering, Bachelor and Masters of Electronic Engineering. Experience with several startups.

team.title: Power Electronics Design Engineer
team.name: Harris Shallcross
team.bioHtml: Power Electronics Design Engineer at OXTO Energy

jobs.title: Electrical Engineer
jobs.description:
Here at Oxto Energy, we develop Flywheel Energy Storage Systems (FESS). We are currently looking for an electrical engineer to help with system design and integration. You will be required to generate single line diagrams for implementing our systems and selecting suitable components for implementation.

Essential skills:
•	Strong electrical design knowledge and experience
•	Knowledge of single phase and three phase systems
•	Understanding of component rating (e.g. bus bars, cabling, connectors)
•	Ability to draw SLDs (single line diagrams) and electrical schematics

Desirable skills:
•	Knowledge of motor systems
•	Knowledge of high power inverters and rectifiers
•	Knowledge of Microgrid systems
•	Experience with designing to regulation and standards
•	Maintenance plan development
•	International communication and working
•	Understanding of BS7671, BS88-2, BS7430 and IEC61000 where possible
Software requirements:
•	Microsoft office
•	Autodesk Electrical/DesignSpark Electrical or equivalent (we have a license for Autodesk Electrical)

We are based in Guildford.

jobs.title: Office Administrator / PA
jobs.description:
We are looking for an energetic office administrator for our offices in Guildford.

Tasks include:

- general office administration
- phone call redirection
- purchasing and research
- assistant to the CEO
- scheduling of team's travel plans
- and other office based day to day tasks

Knowledge of Xero, Office suite and good English language would be great.

Looking forward in speaking to you soon!

jobs.title: Senior Finite Element Analysis Engineer (FEA)
jobs.description:
We are looking for a FEA expert to come and join our team of Engineers. 

Responsibility
•	Fatigue stress analysis of metallic dynamic components and the production of reports.
•	Static, Dynamic and Thermal Finite Element modelling and analysis using ANSYS or other FEA model to support design verification.
•	Development of test proposals, support to testing and analysis / reporting of test results.
•	Make efficiency improvements to analytical processes.
•	Undertake bearing analysis.
•	Provide day to day analytical support to the engineering group.

Requirements
•	Degree-qualified in an appropriate engineering discipline (Mechanical Engineering or Aeronautical) Other qualifications, in combination with relevant experience, may also be considered. A materials or mechanical analyst background and a strong interest in developing your career as a mechanical analyst
•	An understanding of material behaviour, crack propagation, contact, thermo-mechanical fatigue and statistics
•	Good knowledge of materials
•	Knowledge of aerospace materials and processes with regard to strength & fatigue
•	A solid foundation in mechanical engineering principles
•	Knowledge of Finite Element Analysis principles
•	Knowledge of rotodynamic analysis
•	Knowledge of fatigue analysis 
•	Analysis of rotating machinery
•	ANSYS Mechanical or similar FEA package
•	Knowledge of industry codes and standards
•	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
•	Bearing analysis

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Here at Oxto Energy, we develop Flywheel Energy Storage Systems (FESS). We are currently looking for a software engineer to help with system design, integration and support. You will be involved with the implementation of high level control algorithms, UI development and full stack development.

Essential skills:
•	Good coding practice
•	Knowledge of distributed network systems
•	Database management and administration
•	Experience of Python OOP or C++

Desirable skills:
•	Knowledge of source control (Github/Gitlab)
•	Experience in PHP, Javascript, HTML and SQL
•	Technical software design
•	UI development in Python (Tkinter)
•	Low level communication protocols (UART) and interfacing in Windows
•	Real time system development
•	Experience with AWS

We are based in Guildford.
